bibdata.title: IEEE ABBET(TM) Trial-Use Standard for A Broad-Based Environment for Test (ABBET) Overview and Architecture
IEEE ABBET(TM) Trial-Use Standard for A Broad-Based Environment for Test (ABBET) Overview and Architecture

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded. The overall concept of A Broad-Based Environment for Test (ABBET) is defined, and mandatory requirements for implementations ABBET are specified. The elements of ABBET and their interrelationships are described. Guidelines and requirements governing the elements of the ABBET set of standards and guides are established, and common terms to be used throughout the set are defined.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
